snippet: An escort who claimed that a former member of the coaching staff hired her to strip for and have sex with recruits and players said she had no proof that Coach Rick Pitino knew of her activities.
abstract: Escort Katina Powell, who claims former University of Louisville employee Andre McGee hired her and other dancers to strip for and have sex with basketball recruits and players, says she has no physical proof that coach Rick Pitino knew about arrangement; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: An escort who claimed that a former member of the coaching staff hired her to strip for and have sex with recruits and players said she had no proof that Coach Rick Pitino knew of her activities.
